  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(TaxiCompany company, Location location)
      Constructor of class Vehicle
      Parameters:
      company - The taxi company. Must not be null.
      location - The vehicle's starting point. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If company or location is null.

      public abstract void setPickupLocation(Location location)
      Receive a pickup location. How this is handled depends on the type of vehicle.
      Parameters:
      location - The pickup location.

      Parameters:

      public abstract boolean isFree()
      Is the vehicle free?
      Returns:
      Whether or not this vehicle is free.

    • offloadPassenger

      public abstract void offloadPassenger()
      Offload any passengers whose destination is the current location.

      public Location getLocation()
      Returns:
      Where this vehicle is currently located.

      Set the current location.
      Parameters:
      location - Where it is. Must not be null.

      NullPointerException - If location is null.

    • getTargetLocation

      public Location getTargetLocation()
      Get the target location.
      Returns:
      Where this vehicle is currently headed, or null if it is idle.

    • setTargetLocation

      public void setTargetLocation(Location location)
      Set the required target location.
      Parameters:
      location - Where to go. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If location is null.

    • clearTargetLocation

      public void clearTargetLocation()
      Clear the target location.

    • getIdleCount

      public int getIdleCount()
      Returns:
      On how many steps this vehicle has been idle.

      public void incrementIdleCount()
      Increment the number of steps on which this vehicle has been idle.
